deprecated_notify_vestaboard.title: Deprecated notify action used
deprecated_notify_vestaboard.description: The action `notify.{action_name}` has been deprecated. This will stop working in a future version of the Vestaboard integration. To fix the issue, use the `vestaboard.message` action instead and restart Home Assistant.
